Lyric:
[by:niu_wife]
[ti:Not Afraid]
[ar:Eminem]
[00:00.500]Eminem - Not Afraid
[00:01.500]Maximal R - Your First R Source!
[00:02.000]
[00:04.890]I'm not afraid to take a stand
[00:06.220]Everybody come take my hand I guess
[00:11.900]We'll walk this road together, through the storm
[00:14.780]Whatever weather, cold or warm
[00:17.530]Just let you know that, you're not alone
[00:20.270]Hola if you feel that you've been down the same road
[00:23.130]
[00:23.490]You can try and read my lyrics off of this paper before I lay 'em
[00:26.600]But you won't take this thing out these words before I say 'em
[00:29.280]Cause ain't no way I'm let you stop me from causing mayhem
[00:31.970]When I say 'em or do something I do it, I don't give a damn
[00:34.660]What you think, I'm doing this for me, so fuck the world
[00:38.200]Feed it beans, it's gassed up, if a thing's stopping me
[00:40.160]I'mma be what I set out to be, without a doubt undoubtedly
[00:42.020]And all those who look down on me I'm tearing down your balcony
[00:46.100]No if ands or buts don't try to ask him why or how can he
[00:48.810]From Infinite down to the last Relapse album he's still shit and
[00:52.000]Whether he's on salary, paid hourly
[00:54.110]Until he bows out or he shit's his bowels out of him
[00:57.150]Whichever comes first, for better or worse
[00:59.030]He's married to the game, like a fuck you for christmas
[01:02.110]His gift is a curse, forget the earth he's got the urge
[01:05.110]To pull his dick from the dirt and fuck the universe
[01:07.080]
[01:07.530]I'm not afraid to take a stand
[01:13.140]Everybody come take my hand
[01:18.370]We'll walk this road together, through the storm
[01:21.560]Whatever weather, cold or warm
[01:24.280]Just let you know that, you're not alone
[01:27.210]Holla if you feel that you've been down the same road
[01:29.820]
[01:30.170]Ok quit playin' with the scissors and shit, and cut the crap
[01:32.920]I shouldn't have to rhyme these words in the rhythm for you to know it's a rap
[01:37.300]You said you was king, you lied through your teeth
[01:39.820]For that fuck your feelings, instead of getting crowned you're getting capped
[01:41.180]And to the fans, I'll never let you down again, I'm back
[01:44.520]I promise to never go back on that promise, in fact
[01:47.010]Let's be honest, that last Relapse CD was "ehhhh"
[01:49.940]Perhaps I ran them accents into the ground
[01:52.490]Relax, I ain't going back to that now
[01:55.160]All I'm tryna say is get back, click-clack BLAOW
[01:57.850]Cause I ain't playin' around
[01:59.270]There's a game called circle and I don't know how
[02:01.560]I'm way too up to back down
[02:03.490]But I think I'm still tryna figure this crap out
[02:06.230]Thought I had it mapped out but I guess I didn't
[02:08.400]This fucking black cloud's still follow's me around
[02:10.810]But it's time to exercise these demons
[02:12.620]These motherfuckers are doing jumping jacks now!
[02:14.310]
[02:14.680]I'm not afraid to take a stand
[02:20.180]Everybody come take my hand
[02:25.400]We'll walk this road together, through the storm
[02:28.720]Whatever weather, cold or warm
[02:31.290]Just let you know that, you're not alone
[02:34.120]Holla if you feel that you've been down the same road
[02:36.050]
[02:39.550]And I just can't keep living this way
[02:42.550]So starting today, I'm breaking out of this cage
[02:47.810]I'm standing up, Imma face my demons
[02:50.230]I'm manning up, Imma hold my ground
[02:53.800]I've had enough, now I'm so fed up
[02:56.540]Time to put my life back together right now
[02:58.560]
[02:59.630]It was my decision to get clean, I did it for me
[03:02.410]Admittedly i probably did it subliminally for you
[03:05.660]So I could come back a brand new me, you helped see me through
[03:08.730]And don't even realise what you did, believe me you
[03:11.150]I been through the ringer, but they can do little to the middle finger
[03:14.410]I think I got a tear in my eye, I feel like the king of
[03:17.390]My world, haters can make like bees with no stingers, and drop dead
[03:21.160]No more beef flingers, no more drama from now on, I promise
[03:24.000]To focus soley on handling my responsibility's as a father
[03:27.780]So I solemnly swear to always treat this roof like my daughters and raise it
[03:30.680]You couldn't lift a single shingle lonely
[03:33.300]Cause the way I feel, I'm strong enough to go to the club
[03:36.140]Put a ??? and lift the whole liquor counter up
[03:38.900]Cause I'm raising the bar, I shoot for the moon
[03:41.350]But I'm too busy gazing at stars, I feel amazing and
[03:43.240]
[03:43.890]I'm not afraid to take a stand
[03:49.280]Everybody come take my hand
[03:54.690]We'll walk this road together, through the storm

[04:00.590]Just let you know that, you're not alone
